dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2738 IH: Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Williams of Texas (for himself and Mr. Gimenez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 235(b)(2)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the implementation of the Migrant Protection Protocols.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2023.

section.header: Mandatory implementation of the Migrant Protection Protocols
section.text: Section 235(b)(2)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1225(b)(2)(C)) is amended by striking may and inserting shall.
